name: Plants vs Marios
description:
Do you like Plants vs Zombies ? Mario ? So...

Try Plants vs Marios !!!

The game is really hard so, be relaxed and calm when you lose or you'll break your PC and this is not cool...

You have to collect suns to plant plants who can kill marios. If marios enter your house, you lose.

What's the best strategy ?
